name: n_jobs
description: Provide the number of parallel jobs

name: n_clusters_init
description: Provide the number of initial clusters for k-means

name: n_clusters_out
description: Provide the number of clusters selected from k-means

name: n_molecules
description: Number of molecules in the given system

name: sampling
description: Whether to select a random sample from the best n_clusters_out

name: n_structures_out
description: Provide the number of structures = local minima outputted

name: level
description: [XTB]/[DFT] Whether to perform selection on XTB or DFT structures

name: normEd
description: Normalise energies and convert to kcal/mol

name: verbose
description: Whether to print out some progress

name: plotClustering
description: Whether to visualize clustering results. Uses hierarchical clustering and rather greedy t-SNE
